name: Settling In
description:
Welcome to your new planet! But you must get groceries! Lets go!

Right click to move to a point.

Left click only works on objects you are close to.

Left click on item to pick it up and carry it!

Left click on planet to drop your items on the planet.

 Left click on portals to travel to other systems.

Click on home to get back home.

Once you have the item your home planet needs, you can go back home, and drop the the item on the planet to get a new task.

Zoom in/out with mouse wheel!
